text: Swarnamukhi is a river in southern India. The holy Hindu temples of Tirumala and Srikalahasti are located in the river basin. It was mentioned as Mogaleru in the works of Dhurjati. Kalyani Dam with 25 million cubic meters live storage was constructed in 1977 across its tributary Kalyani river. ==References== ==External links== Category:Rivers of Andhra Pradesh Category:Geography of Chittoor district Category:Rivers of India
title: Swarnamukhi
